notes.claude: Full /gsd:* command support via native slash command system
notes.copilot: Use skills with $get-shit-done instead of /gsd:* commands
notes.codex: Use skills with $get-shit-done instead of /gsd:* commands

notes.claude: No limitations on concurrent agent invocation
notes.copilot: No limitations on concurrent agent invocation
notes.codex: No limitations on concurrent agent invocation
